data.comment: The match has started.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a Chelsea throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Chelsea.
Chelsea pushes forward through Benjamin Chilwell, whose finish on goal is saved.
Chelsea are coming forward and Hakim Ziyech gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, Sheffield have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benjamin Chilwell for Chelsea is whistled offside.
In the minute 7, Sheffield to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 9, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Sheffield take a 0-1 lead thanks to David McGoldrick.
Great play from Sander Berge to set up the goal.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Sheffield.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Free kick Sheffield.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in London.
Chelsea's Tammy Abraham gets in a shot on goal at Stamford Bridge. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 16, Mason Mount of Chelsea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Sheffield.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Throw-in for Sheffield at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 22, Sheffield's Max Lowe is on target but unsuccessful.
Tammy Abraham gets an equalizer for Chelsea. The score is now 1-1.
Mateo Kovacic with an assist there.
In the minute 25, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Sheffield.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Timo Werner (Chelsea) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 33, Rhian Brewster for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 34, Reece James gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chelsea.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Goal! Benjamin Chilwell gives Chelsea a 2-1 lead in London.
Hakim Ziyech instrumental with a fine assist.
Chelsea needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Sheffield, close to Chelsea's area.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 37, At Stamford Bridge, John Egan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Chelsea drives forward and Benjamin Chilwell gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 40, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Chelsea drive upfield and Hakim Ziyech gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Can Chelsea capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 43, Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Sheffield, close to Chelsea's area.
John Lundstram of Sheffield smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in London.
In the minute 46, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 49, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jon Moss awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 52, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
Hakim Ziyech (Chelsea) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 58, Tammy Abraham (Chelsea) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Sheffield.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Enda Stevens for Sheffield who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 60, Sheffield's Enda Stevens looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Oliver Norwood with Ben Osborn. This is the first substitution made today by Chris Wilder.
In the minute 63, Oliver McBurnie is on a sub for Rhian Brewster for Sheffield.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Chelsea.
Chelsea's Reece James is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in London.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Mateo Kovacic for Chelsea gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Sheffield at Stamford Bridge.
Jon Moss signals a Chelsea throw-in in Sheffield's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Attention is being given to Chelsea’s Mateo Kovacic and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 71, Chelsea have a goal kick.
Mateo Kovacic (Chelsea) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jorginho.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Chelsea in the half of Sheffield.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Sheffield.
Sander Berge (Sheffield) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 76, Chelsea to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Free kick in a good position for Chelsea!
Goal! Chelsea extend their lead to 3-1 through Thiago Silva.
In the minute 77, Hakim Ziyech with an assist there.
Chelsea's Timo Werner misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
In the minute 79, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
It's now 4-1 in London as Timo Werner scores for Chelsea.
Great play from N`Golo Kante to set up the goal.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chelsea's half?
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 87, Olivier Giroud is replacing Timo Werner for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 88, Jon Moss signals a Sheffield throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sheffield push forward at Stamford Bridge and George Baldock gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chelsea defence.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Chelsea drives forward and Mason Mount gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Jon Moss signals a Sheffield throw-in in Chelsea's half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-1.
